Is chart output image or HTML?
Enter SQL for chart data. You can use SQL parameters like $=this.Params.dateStart$, $=this.Params.intFoo$, $=this.Params.stringBar, etc..
If SQL is used, enter column name for the series, otherwise enter series' names seperated with pipe (|)
If SQL is used, enter column name for the labels of x axis, otherwise enter label names seperated with pipe (|)
If SQL is used, enter column name for the values, otherwise enter values seperated with comma (,) and pipe (|) such as: 10,20,30|23,34,2
Specify format to use for labels. For example for dates you can enter dd MMMM yyyy
Select a position for the legends
Enter comma seperated color hex values for the chart such as: 660000,006600,000066,336600,660033,003366
Enter background fill style. Ex: s,EFEFEF (See also: Solid fill, linear gradient, linear stripes)
Enter chart fill style. Ex: s,EFEFEF (See also: Solid fill, linear gradient, linear stripes)
For the margins of the chart use following format: [left margin],[right margin],[top margin],[bottom margin]|[legend width],[legend height]
For the style of title use this format: [title color],[font size]
For the gridlines use this format: [x axis step size],[y axis step size],[length of line segment],[length of blank segment]
Date which the circulation data belongs to.
